name: OpenAPI Documentation
description: Standard for comprehensive API endpoint documentation to aid AI Agent discovery and usage
requirements: Each endpoint must have a docstring with description
Parameter types must be properly annotated
Parameters should include descriptions when present
Routes should use appropriate HTTP methods
documentation:
Standard ensuring comprehensive API endpoint documentation for AI Agent discovery and usage. The validation is flexible regarding docstring formatting, allowing both Google-style and reStructured Text docstrings, with or without initial newlines after opening quotes. The focus is on content quality rather than specific formatting.

Good documentation should include:
1. Clear description of what the endpoint does
2. Explanation of parameters and their purposes
3. Description of the response structure
4. Information about possible errors

This flexibility allows developers to follow their preferred documentation style while ensuring the essential information is present to help the AI Agent understand and use the endpoints correctly.
